title: (x) Serving the People of New Orleans - Eckmann {Mark S}
content:
can anyone ID this font? I’m not even sure what this “style” is called to help with my search.

Sorry about the low quality.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [serving.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604041945/http:/typophile.com/files/serving.jpg) | 45.64 KB |
author: evan

comments.content: It’s a bit distorted, but [Eckmann](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604041945/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/eckmann/) should be close enough.
Thank you, I’m sure some poor printing process eliminated all the details of this font. I see it now.
